totalAmountLargerThan.description: When specified, only asset wallets with total balance larger than this amount are returned.

assetId.description: When specified, only asset wallets cross vault accounts that have this asset ID are returned.

before.description: Fetches the next paginated response before this element. This element is a cursor and is returned at the response of the previous page.

after.description: Fetches the next paginated response after this element. This element is a cursor and is returned at the response of the previous page.

limit.description: The maximum number of asset wallets in a single response. The default is 200 and the maximum is 1000.
